name: Declutter Series - W3Schools
description: Removes adverts and useless buttons. Sticks the next/prev navigation bar to the bottom of the page. Faithful in style to unmodified W3Schools, compatible with most other themes. Part of the Declutter Series.

user.name: Herossaumure
user.about: I am gradually learning HTML5 and CSS by making styles and websites. Visit my testing page: Testing Site for HTML (tumblr) Contact me: Herossaumure (tumblr) Herossaumure (reddit)

additional_info:
Items removed:
  • Adverts
  • Colour Picker link
  • "Top 10" links
  • Internal links
Items modified:
  • Next/Prev page selector is sticky, ie. remains at bottom of page while scrolling
  • Page selector matches in colour and style to the page nav at the top of the page
